Here's the full list of files you'd need to transplant TastyTracker to
a web server as discussed in chapter 9. On each line, we first show
where you'll find the file in the development structure we've been
working with. Then, after the word 'to,' we show the location that the
file would go in the directory structure on the hosting provider's
filesystem--the production directory structure.

Remember, all of the production paths are treated as if the topmost
directory is / (htdocs root), no matter what it actually is. If you
need the topmost directory of the application to be in a path which
isn't /, we give instructions on that later, so read ahead first. And
if you'd prefer to use the non-minified files, check the list of
node_modules dependencies provided in chapter 9, because two of them
don't live in the same directory as their minified counterparts, and
one has a nonstandard name change.

index.html (modified version) to /index.html
styles.css to /styles.css
systemjs.config.js (modified version) to /systemjs.config.js

app/datepicker.component.css to /app/datepicker.component.css
app/trends.component.css to /app/trends.component.css
app/datepicker.component.html to /app/datepicker.component.html
app/meal-entry.component.html to /app/meal-entry.component.html
app/meal-list.component.html to /app/meal-list.component.html
app/totals.component.html to /app/totals.component.html
app/trends.component.html to /app/trends.component.html
app/app.component.js to /app/app.component.js
app/app.module.js to /app/app.module.js
app/app.routing.js to /app/app.routing.js
app/date-display.pipe.js to /app/date-display.pipe.js
app/datepicker.component.js to /app/datepicker.component.js
app/main.js to /app/main.js
app/meal.js to /app/meal.js
app/meal.service.js to /app/meal.service.js
app/meal-entry.component.js to /app/meal-entry.component.js
app/meal-list.component.js to /app/meal-list.component.js
app/restaurant.js to /app/restaurant.js
app/restaurant.service.js to /app/restaurant.service.js
app/totals.component.js to /app/totals.component.js
app/trends.component.js to /app/trends.component.js

node_modules/font-awesome/fonts/* (all six files) to /fonts/*

node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css to /js/bootstrap.min.css
node_modules/bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.js to /js/bootstrap.js
node_modules/font-awesome/css/font-awesome.min.css to /js/font-awesome.min.css
node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js to /js/jquery.min.js
node_modules/moment/min/moment.min.js to /js/moment.min.js
node_modules/reflect-metadata/Reflect.js to /js/Reflect.js
node_modules/core-js/client/shim.min.js to /js/shim.min.js
node_modules/systemjs/dist/system.js to /js/system.js
node_modules/tether/dist/js/tether.min.js to /js/tether.min.js
node_modules/zone.js/dist/zone.min.js to /js/zone.min.js

node_modules/@angular/common/bundles/common.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/common.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/compiler/bundles/compiler.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/compiler.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/core/bundles/core.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/core.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/forms/bundles/forms.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/forms.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/platform-browser/bundles/platformbrowser.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/platform-browser.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/platform-browser-dynamic/bundles/platform-browser-dynamic.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/platform-browser-dynamic.umd.min.js
node_modules/@angular/router/bundles/router.umd.min.js to /js/@angular/router.umd.min.js

node_modules/moment/locale/* (all 104 files) to /js/locale/*

node_modules/rxjs/BehaviorSubject.js to /js/rxjs/BehaviorSubject.js
node_modules/rxjs/InnerSubscriber.js to /js/rxjs/InnerSubscriber.js
node_modules/rxjs/Notification.js to /js/rxjs/Notification.js
node_modules/rxjs/Observable.js to /js/rxjs/Observable.js
node_modules/rxjs/Observer.js to /js/rxjs/Observer.js
node_modules/rxjs/OuterSubscriber.js to /js/rxjs/OuterSubscriber.js
node_modules/rxjs/Subject.js to /js/rxjs/Subject.js
node_modules/rxjs/SubjectSubscription.js to /js/rxjs/SubjectSubscription.js
node_modules/rxjs/Subscriber.js to /js/rxjs/Subscriber.js
node_modules/rxjs/Subscription.js to /js/rxjs/Subscription.js
